description:
A great cup of coffee deserves a great cup. With this bundle, the only thing between you and a cup of rich dark roast of coffee, is a little hot water. Pairing their Flash Fuel instant coffee with their enameled steel mug, Canadian Heritage Roasting Co. has set up a great gift option for the coffee lover on your list.

  • 355ml enameled steel mug is durable and dishwasher safe
  • Blend of Calgary Heritage Roasting Company’s instant and micro-ground coffee, this adds a robust flavour not usually found in instant coffees, just know you will have a little sediment in your cup, like with a French press
  • 10 x 3.5g poches of coffee, so plan accordingly, you wouldn’t want to be flipping a coin for who does and doesn’t get coffee on your last day on the trail
name: Canadian Heritage Roasting Co. The Perfect Match Coffee and Enamel Mug
